attributes.action: Make clear that anyone who wants to can create an e-petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that anyone can create a petition on this site and then make out like it is anyway shape or form "official"

We the undersigned would like to make it clear to the public that creating a petition against your chosen law or proposed law or indeed anything else is as easy as 1 2 3.

This took me five minutes

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
